metadata.title: CVE-2019-19797 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
read_colordef in read.c in Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7b has an out-of-bounds write.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7a-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7a-7ubuntu0.1').
